p: Lyophilized adenosine (Cas no: 58-61-7), guanosine (Cas no: 118-00-3), and cytidine (Cas no: 65-46-3) were obtained from Sigma-Aldrich Co. (St. Louis, MO). Each 10 mM stock solution was prepared in 0.1 M perchloric acid and diluted with PBS (131.5 mM NaCl, 3.25 mM KCl, 1.2 mM CaCl 2, 12.5 mM NaH 2PO 4, 1.2 mM MgCl 2, and 2.0 mM Na 2SO 4 with pH adjusted to 7.4).
